movies.title: Appleseed Alpha
movies.plot: Based on the comic book by the creator of Ghost in the Shell, a young female soldier Deunan and her cyborg partner Briareos survive through the post World War 3 apocalyptic New York in search of human's future hope, the legendary city of Olympus.
movies.simplePlot: Based on the comic book by the creator of Ghost in the Shell, a young female soldier Deunan and her cyborg partner Briareos survive through the post World War 3 apocalyptic New York in ...

biography.bio: Yuka Komatsu is known for her work on Appleseed Alpha (2014), No Love Juice: Rustling in Bed (1999) and Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Blood Prison (2011).
biography.name: Yuka Komatsu

biography.bio: Jun'ichi Suwabe was born on March 29, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Space Dandy (2014), Kuroko's Basketball (2012) and Appleseed Alpha (2014).
biography.name: Jun'ichi Suwabe

biography.bio: Aoi Yuki was born on March 27, 1992 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Your Name (2016), Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part III: Rebellion (2013) and Appleseed Alpha (2014).
biography.name: Aoi Yuki

biography.bio: Hiroki Takahashi was born on September 7, 1974 in Adachi, Japan. He is known for his work on Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (2000), Appleseed Alpha (2014) and Street Fighter IV (2008).
biography.name: Hiroki Takahashi

biography.bio: Hiroki Touchi was born on May 22, 1966 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Trinity Blood (2005), Appleseed Alpha (2014) and Fairy Tail: Priestess of the Phoenix (2012).
biography.name: Hiroki Touchi

biography.bio: Kaori Nazuka was born on April 24, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Eureka Seven (2005), Now and then, here and there - L'autre monde (1999) and Canvas2: Niji iro no sukecchi (2005).
biography.name: Kaori Nazuka

biography.bio: Katsunosuke Hori is an actor, known for Paprika (2006), Appleseed Alpha (2014) and Firebird: Karma Chapter (1986).
biography.name: Katsunosuke Hori

biography.bio: Tesshô Genda was born on May 20, 1948 in Okayama, Japan as Yokoi Mitsuo. He is an actor, known for Akira (1988), Ghost in the Shell (1995) and Beast King GoLion (1981).
biography.name: Tesshô Genda

biography.bio: Elizabeth Bunch was born on October 23, 1975 in Huntington, West Virginia, USA. She is an actress, known for Appleseed Alpha (2014), Clannad: After Story (2008) and Clannad (2007).
biography.name: Elizabeth Bunch

biography.bio: Wendel Calvert is an actor and producer, known for Appleseed Alpha (2014), Slayers Great (1997) and Still Workin on It (2010).
biography.name: Wendel Calvert

biography.bio: Luci Christian was born on March 18, 1973 in Houston, Texas, USA as Louisa Michelle Christian. She is an actress and writer, known for One Piece (1999), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Grave of the Fireflies (1988). She has been married to Michael Bell since 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Luci Christian

biography.bio: Adam Gibbs is an actor, known for Grave of the Fireflies (1988), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Harlock: Space Pirate (2013).
biography.name: Adam Gibbs

biography.bio: Chris Hutchinson is an actor, known for Appleseed Alpha (2014) and Angel Beats! (2010).
biography.name: Chris Hutchinson

biography.bio: David Matranga was born on April 20, 1975 in Houston, Texas, USA as David Anthony Matranga. He is known for his work on Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012), Journey to Agartha (2011) and Grave of the Fireflies (1988).
biography.name: David Matranga

biography.bio: Brina Palencia was born as Brina Michelle Palencia. She is an Honduran-American actress and director, known for One Piece (1999), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009), The Walking Dead (2010), and Star-Crossed (2014). Growing up, she split her time between Honduras and the United States. She is fluent in both English and Spanish.
biography.name: Brina Palencia

camera: Arri Alexa XT Plus, Fujinon Premier Lenses
